text: Abû ‘Uthman Sa’îd ibn Hakam al Qurashi is known as the first Ra’îs of Manûrqa. He was born on December 30, 1204 and died on January 9, 1282.Abû 'Uthmân Sa'îd ibn Hakam al Qurashi ==Footnotes== # (Arabic) Chief, leader. == References == Category:1204 births Category:1282 deaths
title: Abû 'Uthmân Sa'îd ibn Hakam al Qurashi
